flavorText:
"The higher the mind soars, the greater its understanding of the law."
—Isperia

foreignData.flavorText: „Je höher der Verstand sich erhebt, desto tiefgründiger ist das Verständnis für das Rechtswesen." —Isperia
foreignData.name: Azorius-Runenschlüssel
foreignData.text:
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {W} oder {U}.
{W}{U}: Der Azorius-Runenschlüssel wird bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einer 2/2 weißen und blauen fliegenden Vogel-Artefaktkreatur.

foreignData.flavorText: "Cuanto más alto vuela la mente, mayor es la comprensión de la ley." —Isperia
foreignData.name: Llave rúnica azoria
foreignData.text:
{T}: Agrega {W} o {U} a tu reserva de maná.
{W}{U}: La Llave rúnica azoria se convierte en una criatura artefacto Ave blanca y azul 2/2 con la habilidad de volar hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: « Plus l'esprit s'élève, mieux il comprend la loi. » —Isperia
foreignData.name: Runeclé d'Azorius
foreignData.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {W} ou {U} à votre réserve.
{W}{U} : La Runeclé d'Azorius devient une créature-artefact 2/2 blanche et bleue Oiseau avec le vol jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: "Più in alto si eleva la mente, maggiore è la sua comprensione della legge." —Isperia
foreignData.name: Runachiave Azorius
foreignData.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {W} o {U} alla tua riserva di mana.
{W}{U}: La Runachiave Azorius diventa una creatura artefatto Uccello 2/2 bianca e blu con volare fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 「精神がさらなる高みへと昇れば、それだけ法の理解も深まります。」 ――イスペリア
foreignData.name: アゾリウスの魔鍵
foreignData.text:
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{W}か{U}を加える。
{W}{U}：アゾリウスの魔鍵はターン終了時まで、飛行を持つ白であり青である２/２の鳥・アーティファクト・クリーチャーになる。

foreignData.flavorText: "생각의 지평이 넓어지면 법에 대한 이해도 높아지는 법이지." —이스페리아
foreignData.name: 아조리우스 열쇠룬
foreignData.text:
{T}: {W} 또는 {U}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.
{W}{U}: 턴종료까지, 아조리우스 열쇠룬은 비행 능력을 가진 2/2 백색 및 청색 조류 마법물체 생물이 된다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Quanto mais elevada a mente, maior é a sua compreensão da lei." — Isperia
foreignData.name: Chave Rúnica Azorius
foreignData.text:
{T}: Adicione {W} ou {U} à sua reserva de mana.
{W}{U}: Chave Rúnica Azorius torna-se uma criatura artefato branca e azul 2/2 do tipo Ave com voar até o final do turno.

foreignData.flavorText: «Чем выше поднимается разум, тем лучше он постигает закон». — Исперия
foreignData.name: Рунный Ключ Азориусов
foreignData.text:
{T}: добавьте {W} или {U} в ваше хранилище маны.
{W}{U}: Рунный Ключ Азориусов становится артефактным существом 2/2 белая и синяя Птица с Полетом до конца хода.

foreignData.flavorText: 「心智提升得越高，就越能理解律法。」 ～伊佩利
foreignData.name: 俄佐立符镇兵
foreignData.text:
{T}：加{W}或{U}到你的法术力池中。
{W}{U}：俄佐立符镇兵成为2/2白蓝双色，具飞行异能的鸟神器生物直到回合结束。

foreignData.flavorText: 「心智提昇得越高，就越能理解律法。」 ～伊佩利
foreignData.name: 俄佐立符鎮兵
foreignData.text:
{T}：加{W}或{U}到你的魔法力池中。
{W}{U}：俄佐立符鎮兵成為2/2白藍雙色，具飛行異能的鳥神器生物直到回合結束。

name: Azorius Keyrune
originalText:
{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.
{W}{U}: Azorius Keyrune becomes a 2/2 white and blue Bird artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

rulings.text: Until the ability that turns the Keyrune into a creature resolves, the Keyrune is colorless.

Activating the ability that turns the Keyrune into a creature while it’s already a creature will override any effects that set its power and/or toughness to another number, but effects that modify power and/or toughness without directly setting them will still apply.

text:
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
{W}{U}: Azorius Keyrune becomes a 2/2 white and blue Bird artifact creature with flying until end of turn.
